full_text: To obtain Immigration and Naturalization forms. contact 1-800-870-367 nd expect delivery in one week. All applications, unless otherwise indicated, are to be mailed to the Newark District office. That address is: TDD 1-800-767-1833 Immigration and Naturalization Service 970 Broad Street Newark NJ 07102 Forms 1-129(petition for nonimmigrant worker), I-140(petition for immigrant worker), 129F (petition for alien fiancee), I-539 (extensions of stay for nonimmigrants), I-751 (removal of conditional residence). I- 130(petition for alien relative living outside the United States), -589(application for political asylum). and I-765(employment authorization) are to be mailed to: Eastern Service Center U.S. Immigration and Naturalization Service 75 Lower Welden Street Saint Albans. VT 05479-0001 (802) 527-3160 The political asylum unit is located at 1200 Wall Street West. Lyndhurst. NJ 07071 The phone number for this office is 1-800-755-0777 The Philadelphia Immigration office. located at 1600 Callowhill Street. does supply the general public with all Immigration and Naturalization forms. The directions to the Philadelphia office are as follows: Take the Benjamin Franklin Bridge West to Philadelphia. Pay toll. Follow the Vine Street local exit to Callowhill Street. Make a right on Callowhill Street. DO NOT TAKE THE I-95 EXIT! The office is located on the left hand side of Callowhill Street. A reminder, you will follow the I-95 exit. but don't take the off ramp for it. Stay to your left on Callowhill Street. and the office is about 100 yards down the road. Parking is available.
